ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Letter ^_^
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hello, I have been on this list for a very long time.. but not ever actually posted.. mainly because I gave up playing eq for about 2 years or maybe
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:47 12/07/2003, you wrote:
> eq
>has changed, but it's starting to get back to the way it used to be and i
>cant wait. but i hope sony gives you your money back or something. i wish
>you had been there. it was nice.


Hello,

I have been on this list for a very long time.. but not ever actually
posted.. mainly because I gave up playing eq for about 2 years or maybe
more... Just recently I tried it again though .. and wow!!! its nice
again!!! I gave up at lvl 54, somewhere along the line the game had changed
for me and I had lost the feeling I first had on being chased by a giant to
the bridge in the karanas.. I had started a few months after the game first
came out.. when they still announced when people made 50 and there were no
expansion packs. I had gained a new husband through the game and we had
decided we wanted to move on to other games (but no they were never as fun.
I tred daoc, Anarchy on line and went back to first person shooters.. but
nothing grabbed me..) Then I had a go on eqemu.. noticed verant were
offering me a free week on real eq . and .. went on line on my old server
Innouruuk again.. well that seemed much the same, and my characters were
all still there and that wouldnt have caught my attention. but then I
noticed there were some new Euro serevers so I tried the new server and
made a cat person.. (ooh . I had bought the luclin expansion and never
bothered to install it before..) and before you can say boo I loved it
again. and.. so many changes for the better!!!!! I became a froglock and
all my family have joined in .. the server is near empty and all the people
friendly . no loud arguments in ooc .. we didn't have the awful horror of
corpse searching at low lvls so we have been runing around exploring and we
can easlily move from one newbie zone to another via pok.. Its great!!!!
Loads of new places to explore. and much much easier to play .. and the
atmosphere seems to have changed back to how it was.. with much
friendliness and many people willing to buff a small frog who croaks a
lot.. I don't know if the game has been destroyed for high end play as I
have no intention at this time of playing my enchanter and having to play
for hours on end and join in massive raids that keep me up all night.. nor
do I wish to hear endlessly about server politics and the best way to share
spawns and zones.. What I do want is what I have found, a family orientated
game (my partner, myself and my kids of 14 and 11 play as a group) where
all of us can lvl up together and explore zones, get the occasional heart
stopping scare as we walk through some dangerous cavern with beasts in it
we haven't seen before, chat in friendly way with people we meet and..
relax.. Verant appear to have made the low lvl game much much easier but at
the same time have enough areas where you haven't been before to make
exploring scary and fun. Mind you I would love a horse but that seems to be
something I would have to work to hard to get...

anyway hello all :)
